Tool

NameIsochrones Constant Speed
ID8
AuthorV.Olaya (c) 2004, V.Wichmann (c) 2015
Specificationgrid, interactive

Description

Isochrones calculation with constant speed based on a user provided Time of Concentration. For each selected pour point, the longest watercourse length and the average slope of the watercourse are reported. These can be used to estimate the Time of Concentration with one of the empirical equations available.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Elevation Grid Grid (input)DEM
Output
Time Out [min]Grid (output)TIME
Options
Time of Concentration [min]Floating pointTIME_OF_CONCENTRATIONTime of Concentration [min] used to estimate flow speed.Minimum: 0.001000 Default: 60.000000
